com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.facebook

Class FacebookSignInProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.facebook.FacebookSignInProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityProvider, SignInProvider

    public class FacebookSignInProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignInProvider
    Sign-in provider for Facebook.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COGNITO_LOGIN_KEY_FACEBOOK
      The Cognito login key for Facebook to be used in the Cognito login Map.

                                                                android.view.View buttonView,
                                                                SignInProviderResultHandler resultsHandler)
        Initialize the sign-in button for the sign-in activity.
        Specified by:
        initializeSignInButton in interface SignInProvider
        Parameters:
        signInActivity - the activity for sign-in.
        buttonView - the view for the sign-in button to initialize.
        resultsHandler - the resultsHandler for provider sign-in.
        Returns:
        the onClickListener for the button to be able to override the listener, and null if the button cannot be initialized.

      • setPermissions

        public static void setPermissions(java.lang.String... userPermissions)
        Add the login permisisons needed by the application. The input has to be a string or array of strings, where each string represents a permisison. Eg: FacebookSignInProvider.setPermissions("public_profile"); FacebookSignInProvider.setPermissions("public_profile", "email");
        Parameters:
        userPermissions - The list of permissions required

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()

      • getCognitoLoginKey

        public java.lang.String getCognitoLoginKey()
        Specified by:
        getCognitoLoginKey in interface IdentityProvider
        Returns:
        the key used by Cognito in its login map when refreshing credentials.

      • refreshUserSignInState

        public boolean refreshUserSignInState()
        Refreshes the state of whether the user is signed-in and returns the updated state. Note: This call may block, so it must not be called from the main thread.
        Specified by:
        refreshUserSignInState in interface IdentityProvider
        Returns:
        true if signed in with this provider, otherwise false.

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken()
        Call getToken to retrieve the access token from successful sign-in with this provider. Note: This call may block if the access token is not already cached.
        Specified by:
        getToken in interface IdentityProvider
        Returns:
        the access token suitable for use with Cognito.

      • refreshToken

        public java.lang.String refreshToken()
        Refreshes the token if it has expired. Note: this call may block due to network access, and must be called from a background thread.
        Specified by:
        refreshToken in interface IdentityProvider
        Returns:
        the refreshed access token, or null if the token cannot be refreshed.

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Call signOut to sign out of this provider.
        Specified by:
        signOut in interface IdentityProvider
